com.orientechnologies.orient.server.distributed.task

Class OAbstractRemoteTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.server.distributed.task.OAbstractRemoteTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ORemoteTask
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAbstractReplicatedTask, OCloseQueryTask, ODropDatabaseTask, OEnterpriseStatsTask, OFetchQueryPageTask, OGossipTask, ORequestDatabaseConfigurationTask, ORestartServerTask, ORunQueryExecutionPlanTask, OStopServerTask, OSynchronizedTaskWrapper, OUnreachableServerLocalTask, OUpdateDatabaseConfigurationTask, OUpdateDatabaseSequenceStatusTask, OUpdateDatabaseStatusTask

    public abstract class OAbstractRemoteTask
extends Object
implements ORemoteTask
    Base class for Tasks to be executed remotely.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--at--orientdb.com)
